name: Complex JSON Example
description: This JSON contains various elements that could confuse a naive parser.

details.description: This is the first item. It includes a quote: "To be or not to be".

level2.level3: Deeply nested value with a quote: "Nested quotes can be tricky!"

details.description: This item has a comma, a quote, and a backslash: "This is a backslash: \\ and a comma, ",".

level2.level3: Another tricky value with a quote: "Watch out for quotes!"

details.description:
This item contains a newline character:
"New lines can also be problematic!"

level2.level3: Final nested value with a quote: "Final thoughts on complexity!"

comments.comment: This is a comment with a quote: "Interesting structure!"
Another comment, with a comma: "I like it, but..."

arrayWithMixedTypes.key: value with a quote: "This could confuse parsers!"
